messages.zh: 第七关（后）
messages.tl: Seventh level (post)

messages.zh: 侦查的结果......不太妙。
messages.tl: The result of the investigation... not very good.

messages.zh: 前方的整合运动有很大一部分是游荡着的破坏分子——
messages.tl: A large part of the Reunion Movement ahead is a wandering destroyer -

messages.zh: 但也有不少是混入其中的训练有素的战斗人员。
messages.tl: But there are also many well-trained combatants who are mixed into it.

messages.zh: 这些家伙，大概就是整合运动的神经系统。
messages.tl: These guys are probably the nervous system of the Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 什么意思？
messages.tl: What do you mean?

messages.zh: 指挥官一旦有所行动，就命令他们将整合运动聚集起来，由他们来带领其他的人。
messages.tl: Once the commander has acted, they are ordered to gather the Reunion Movement and lead them to other people.

messages.zh: 一盘散沙般的暴徒们，真的能做到吗？
messages.tl: Can a sandstorm-like mob really do it?

messages.zh: 凭心而论，原本我并不相信。
messages.tl: In my heart, I didn't believe it.

messages.zh: 没有纪律和训练，部队会失去战斗力。
messages.tl: Without discipline and training, the troops will lose their combat power.

messages.zh: 但现今有机会仔细观察他们之后.....
messages.tl: But now I have the opportunity to observe them carefully.....

messages.zh: ......我很确信，控制他们的是恐怖与狂热。
messages.tl: ... I am very convinced that it is terror and fanaticism to control them.

messages.zh: 毕竟他们从来都不是军队。
messages.tl: After all, they are never an army.

messages.zh: 无论这些人做出什么事、做到什么地步，都是可能的。
messages.tl: No matter what these people do and what they do, it is possible.

messages.zh: 整合运动的领袖究竟是什么样子，我大概可以想象的到。
messages.tl: What the leader of the Reunion Movement looks like, I can probably imagine it.

messages.zh: 我们真的还有胜算吗......
messages.tl: Do we really have a chance to win...

messages.zh: 不是有没有，而是能不能。
messages.tl: There is no, but not.

messages.zh: 我们战胜过形形色色的敌人。
messages.tl: We have defeated all kinds of enemies.

messages.zh: 没有我们不能打破的困境。
messages.tl: There is no dilemma that we cannot break.

messages.zh: 保证博士的安全并撤出切城，这个目标一直没有改变过。
messages.tl: To ensure the safety of the Ph.D. and withdraw from the city, this goal has not changed.

messages.zh: 目标明确，战术合理，加上罗德岛专业的干员们......
messages.tl: Clear goals, tactical, plus Rhodes Island professional Crew...

messages.zh: 我们一定能取得胜利。
messages.tl: We can certainly win.

messages.zh: ——抱歉，说了不过大脑的话。
messages.tl: - Sorry, but the words of the brain.

messages.zh: 在军队，说这种话是得吃鞭子的。
messages.tl: In the army, it is said that this kind of thing has to eat a whip.

messages.zh: 不过我现在可没工夫修理你！走吧！
messages.tl: But I can't fix it now! Let's go!

messages.zh: 都动起来！再慢吞吞的，天灾就要狠狠踹你们的屁股了！
messages.tl: Moved! Slowly, the natural disaster will lick your ass!

messages.zh: 是！
messages.tl: Yes!
